app.database.alignment package¶

Submodules¶

app.database.alignment.alignment_translation module¶

app.database.alignment.alignment_translation.align_translation(transcription_id)[source]¶

Fetches rows from alignment_translation.

Retrieves rows from the transcription and translation tables using the alignment_transcription table to join data

Args:
transcription_id : a transcription_id
Returns:
A list of rows. Each returned row is a tuple with the following database fields: (transcription.transcription_id, translation.translation_id, transcription_row, translation_row)
